alert.note: Alert for Ojai Valley; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 12 at 1:33AM PST until December 13 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 29 to 32 degrees will be possible, especially in wind-sheltered locations. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Valley and Ojai Valley. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional areas may need frost advisories late tonight. In addition, sub-freezing temperatures will be possible again on late Tuesday night into early Wednesday morning, which may prompt additional frost advisories and freeze watches.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
